title: 01/03: 2019 RB Rankings; Antonio Brown is Mad; Playoff Previews (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Jamey Eisenberg and Dave Richard look into the Antonio Brown saga, break down our early top 12 running back rankings and look ahead to the wild-card weekend with playoff challenge rankings. ... We open the show talking about if the Steelers would trade Antonio Brown, as well as the future for Eli Manning with the Giants. Then it's on to our running back rankings for 2019 (15:18), and we debate Saquon Barkley vs. Ezekiel Elliott at No. 2 overall, as well as the value for Le'Veon Bell next season. ... The wild-card round of the NFL playoffs starts this weekend, and we break down the four games (26:35) with IND-HOU, SEA-DAL, LAC-BAL and PHI-CHI. We then get into the CBS Sports playoff challenge rankings and DFS lineups to consider (41:00) for wild-card weekend. ... We close the show with dynasty/keeper emails, and email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Ready for the NFL playoffs? We'll get you set with DFS or Playoff Challenge advice after we take a look at the 2019 RB rankings and all the latest news.
